availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oliver Hazzard Perry Thomas (Mason County, Kentucky, merchant.)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, merchant. Fleming County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sallie Bruce Thomas in Mason County, Kentucky, on October 21, 1853. Father of Emily Thomas, Louella Thomas, Elizabeth Thomas, Bettie Thomas, B. F. Thomas, and George Thomas. Merchant in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Mason County in 1850. Merchant in Mason County in 1860.
